amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), add the following new section: SEC.__. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used for the administration of the Armed Services Vocational Aptitude Battery for the student (high school) testing programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new section to prohibit the use of funds for the administration of the Armed Services Vocational Aptitude Battery for the student (high school) testing programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kucinich amendment (A045) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A045) offered by Mr. Kucinich.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Kucinich amendment (A045) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
